notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! It does NOT mean "actual" (which is "feitelijk" or "echt"). It means "current".
notes.zh: 假朋友！不等于 "actual"(实际的)。它的意思是"当前的"或"最新的"。

notes.en: Essential Dutch custom. Always make an appointment before visiting friends or professionals (doctor, job interview).
notes.zh: 荷兰社交和商务的基本要求。拜访（op bezoek）或看医生前必须预约.

notes.en: "Appeltaart" (apple pie) with whipped cream.
notes.zh: "Appeltaart" (苹果派) 配鲜奶油。

translations.zh: 盒子 / 碗 / 垃圾桶

notes.en: Not "back". A versatile word for any container. "Vuilnisbak" (trash bin), "bakje koffie" (cup of coffee).
notes.zh: 不是 "back"。指各种容器。"Vuilnisbak"(垃圾桶)，口语也常说 "bakje koffie"(一杯咖啡)。

notes.en: Easy fruit.
notes.zh: 方便吃的水果。

notes.en: Penalty for minor offenses like illegal parking, traffic violations, or not carrying ID (from 14 years old).
notes.zh: 对轻微违法行为（如交通违规、未携带身份证件）的惩罚。

notes.en: Can be calling by phone or ringing a doorbell ("aanbellen").
notes.zh: 既是"打电话"，也是"按门铃"。

notes.en: Traditional treat for newborn babies. Blue (boy) or pink (girl) sprinkles.
notes.zh: 庆祝新生儿的传统食物。糖屑为粉色（女孩）或蓝色（男孩）。

notes.en: You can pay by card ("pinnen") or cash ("contant").
notes.zh: 可以刷卡("pinnen")或付现("contant")。

notes.en: May 5th. Celebrating the end of WWII.
notes.zh: 每年 5 月 5 日。庆祝二战结束。

notes.en: "Fluitje" or "vaasje" (types of beer glasses).
notes.zh: "Fluitje" 或 "vaasje" (不同种类的啤酒杯)。

notes.en: Colour of the Tax Office envelopes.
notes.zh: 税务局信封的颜色。

notes.en: Specific for groceries. "Winkelen" is shopping for clothes/fun.
notes.zh: 专指买菜/日用品。"Winkelen" 通常指逛街买衣服。

notes.en: Informal drinks with colleagues or friends, usually with snacks ("borrelhapjes"). "Vrijdagmiddagborrel" (Vrijmibo) is work tradition.
notes.zh: 指非正式的喝一杯。"Vrijmibo" (周五下午酒会) 是公司传统。

notes.en: "Spijkerbroek" (jeans).
notes.zh: "Spijkerbroek" (牛仔裤)。

notes.en: Dutch staple food. Lunch is often bread.
notes.zh: 荷兰主食。午餐通常吃面包。

notes.en: Amsterdam has many bridges.
notes.zh: 阿姆斯特丹有很多桥。

notes.en: Bread is often brown ("bruin brood").
notes.zh: 面包通常是棕色的("bruin brood")。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! Not "brutal" (violent). It means rude or having a big mouth.
notes.zh: 假朋友！不是 "brutal"(残忍)。意思是"厚脸皮"或"无礼"。

notes.en: "Buienradar" is the most used app to check if it will rain in the next 5 mins.
notes.zh: "Buienradar" (阵雨雷达) 是荷兰人最常用的App。

notes.en: Where you wait for the bus. Wave to stop the bus!
notes.zh: 等车的地方。记得招手让司机停车！

notes.en: The person checking tickets on the train.
notes.zh: 火车上查票的人。

notes.en: Cheaper travel times (usually 9:00-16:00 and after 18:30).
notes.zh: 票价更便宜的时段（通常9:00-16:00及18:30后）。

notes.en: What is the date today?
notes.zh: 今天几号？

notes.en: May 4th. Commemoration of all war dead. Two minutes of silence at 8 PM.
notes.zh: 每年 5 月 4 日。晚上 8 点默哀 2 分钟，纪念所有战争死难者。

notes.en: General action verb.
notes.zh: 通用的"做"。

notes.en: Consuming liquids.
notes.zh: 喝水/饮料。

notes.en: "Ik ben druk" (I am busy). "Het is druk" (It is crowded).
notes.zh: "Ik ben druk" (我好忙)。"Het is druk" (人好多)。

notes.en: "Durf jij dat?" (Do you dare?).
notes.zh: "Durf jij dat?" (你敢吗？)。

notes.en: Costs a lot of money.
notes.zh: 很花钱。

notes.en: Plural: "eieren".
notes.zh: 复数："eieren"。

notes.en: Consuming food.
notes.zh: 吃东西。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! It does NOT mean "eventually" (which is "uiteindelijk"). It means "maybe" or "potentially".
notes.zh: 假朋友！不等于 "eventually"(最终)。它的意思是"可能"或"如果有必要的话"。

notes.en: Your relatives.
notes.zh: 你的亲戚家人。

notes.en: It is a verb in Dutch! "Ik fiets naar werk".
notes.zh: 在荷兰语里是动词！"Ik fiets naar werk" (我骑车去上班)。

notes.en: Where you go when you have a flat tire ("lekke band").
notes.zh: 车胎爆了("lekke band")要去的地方。

notes.en: Red asphalt lanes. DO NOT walk here.
notes.zh: 红色沥青路面。千万别在上面走路。

notes.en: Not mandatory in NL, but appreciated (round up or ~10%).
notes.zh: 在荷兰不是强制的，但通常会凑整或给10%左右。

notes.en: Healthy snack.
notes.zh: 健康零食。

notes.en: Train signs are yellow.
notes.zh: 火车标志是黄色的。

notes.en: Used for birthdays, births, weddings, or passing an exam.
notes.zh: 用于生日、新生儿出生、结婚或考试通过等场合。

notes.en: "Gevaarlijk" is dangerous.
notes.zh: "Gevaarlijk" 是形容词"危险的"。

translations.zh: 温馨 / 热闹 / 惬意

notes.en: Quintessentially Dutch. Describes a nice atmosphere with people. No direct translation.
notes.zh: 荷兰文化代表词。形容温馨、社交、愉快的氛围。很难直译。

notes.en: The day before today.
notes.zh: 昨天。

notes.en: Low price.
notes.zh: 价格低。

notes.en: Dutch people love this word! It means it costs nothing.
notes.zh: 荷兰人最爱的词！意思是不要钱。

notes.en: Common weather colour.
notes.zh: 常见的天气颜色。

notes.en: Go (traffic light).
notes.zh: 行（红绿灯）。

notes.en: "Groenteboer" (greengrocer).
notes.zh: "Groenteboer" (菜贩)。

notes.en: Eaten on bread with butter for breakfast/lunch. Only in NL.
notes.zh: 撒在涂了黄油的面包上吃。荷兰特色早餐/午餐。

notes.en: 30 minutes.
notes.zh: 30分钟。

notes.en: Always used with "niet" or "geen". "Je hoeft niet te betalen" (You don't have to pay).
notes.zh: 常搭配 "niet" 使用。"Je hoeft niet..." (你不需要...)。

notes.en: Work for school done at home.
notes.zh: 家庭作业。

notes.en: Beeping your card at the pole/gate. Don't forget!
notes.zh: 在读卡器上刷卡。别忘了！

translations.zh: 打卡进入 / 打卡退出 (公共交通)

notes.en: Mandatory use for the OV-Chipkaart (public transport card) when starting and ending a journey. Failure to check out results in overcharge.
notes.zh: 使用公共交通芯片卡 (OV-Chipkaart) 必须执行的操作，忘记打卡退出会被罚款或多收钱。

notes.en: "Gelukkig nieuwjaar!" (Happy new year!).
notes.zh: "Gelukkig nieuwjaar!" (新年快乐！)。

notes.en: "Regenjas" (raincoat). Essential.
notes.zh: "Regenjas" (雨衣)。必备。

notes.en: Piece of clothing for women.
notes.zh: 女士服装。

notes.en: Gouda cheese is famous. "Kaasschaaf" (cheese slicer).
notes.zh: 豪达奶酪很有名。"Kaasschaaf" (奶酪切片刀)。

notes.en: "Kledingkast" (wardrobe) or "keukenkast" (kitchen cupboard).
notes.zh: "Kledingkast"(衣柜) 或 "keukenkast"(橱柜)。

notes.en: "TV kijken" (watch TV).
notes.zh: "TV kijken" (看电视)。

notes.en: Young person.
notes.zh: 小孩。

notes.en: General term for clothes.
notes.zh: 衣服的总称。

notes.en: Tells you the time.
notes.zh: 看时间的工具。

notes.en: Where you keep your food fresh.
notes.zh: 保鲜食物的地方。

notes.en: "Koffie verkeerd" (coffee with lots of milk).
notes.zh: "Koffie verkeerd" (拿铁/牛奶咖啡)。

notes.en: Buying something in a shop.
notes.zh: 在商店买东西。

notes.en: Look for this word in supermarkets! "35% korting".
notes.zh: 超市里常见的词！"35% korting"。

notes.en: Ability. "Ik kan fietsen".
notes.zh: 能力。"Ik kan fietsen"(我会骑车)。

notes.en: 15 minutes. "Kwart over..." (quarter past...).
notes.zh: 15分钟。"Kwart over..." (几点一刻)。

notes.en: Children must attend school from 5 to 16 years old.
notes.zh: 荷兰的义务教育年龄是 5 岁到 16 岁。

translations.zh: 好吃的 / 舒服的 / 好的

notes.en: Very versatile. Used for food, weather ("lekker weer"), sleep ("lekker slapen"), or even a feeling ("ik voel me niet lekker").
notes.zh: 非常万能。形容食物好吃、天气好("lekker weer")、睡得香("lekker slapen")，或身体舒服。

notes.en: The teacher, often addressed as 'juf' (female) or 'meester' (male) in primary schools. Parents communicate with them about the child's progress.
notes.zh: 老师，在小学常被称为 'juf' (女) 或 'meester' (男)。

notes.en: "Luister goed" (Listen carefully).
notes.zh: "Luister goed" (仔细听)。

notes.en: January, February, etc.
notes.zh: 一月、二月等。

notes.en: To create something or fix something ("auto maken").
notes.zh: 创造某物或修理某物("auto maken")。

notes.en: The most popular second-hand website in NL. Great for furnishing your house cheap.
notes.zh: 荷兰最火的二手交易网站。买家具很便宜。

notes.en: Dutch people drink a lot of milk.
notes.zh: 荷兰人喝很多牛奶。

notes.en: "Ik kom er meteen aan" (I'm coming right away).
notes.zh: "Ik kom er meteen aan" (我马上就来)。

notes.en: Used when you are not sure.
notes.zh: 表示不确定。

notes.en: Obligation. "Ik moet werken".
notes.zh: 义务。"Ik moet werken"(我得工作)。

notes.en: "Mag ik...?" (May I...?). Permission.
notes.zh: "Mag ik...?" (我可以...吗？)。表示请求许可。

notes.en: Can mean "tomorrow" or "morning". "Goedemorgen" (Good morning).
notes.zh: 可以是"明天"也可以是"早晨"。"Goedemorgen" (早上好)。

notes.en: Very important, especially for formal appointments or official visits. If you are late, you must call.
notes.zh: 在正式场合（如医院、面试）非常重要。如果迟到，必须打电话告知。

notes.en: The national colour of the Netherlands (Royal House).
notes.zh: 荷兰的国家代表色（王室）。

notes.en: Father and mother.
notes.zh: 爸爸妈妈。

translations.en: to ask the school for permission
translations.zh: 向学校请假 / 请求许可

notes.en: If a child needs to miss school for special reasons (e.g., family celebration, unusual vacation), parents must ask the school beforehand.
notes.zh: 如果孩子因特殊原因缺课（例如庆祝活动），家长必须事先向学校请假。

notes.en: The universal card for train, bus, tram, metro. Must check in AND out.
notes.zh: 通用于火车、巴士、电车、地铁。必须上下车都刷卡(check in/out)。

notes.en: Switching trains/buses. You usually check out and in again if changing operators (e.g. NS to Arriva).
notes.zh: 换乘火车/巴士。如果换运营商(如NS换Arriva)通常需要先出再进。

notes.en: Essential survival gear in NL.
notes.zh: 荷兰生存必备装备。

notes.en: A Christian holiday (christelijke dag), often celebrated with eating eggs.
notes.zh: 基督教节日，人们通常吃鸡蛋庆祝。

notes.en: Spice.
notes.zh: 香料。

notes.en: Literally "peanut cheese". Dutch people love it. DO NOT translate as "peanut cheese" to English speakers.
notes.zh: 字面意思是"花生奶酪"，其实是花生酱。荷兰人超爱。

notes.en: Paying with debit card (Maestro/V-Pay). Credit cards are often NOT accepted in supermarkets (AH).
notes.zh: 用借记卡支付。注意 Albert Heijn 超市通常不收信用卡(Credit Card)，只收储蓄卡。

notes.en: Communicating with words.
notes.zh: 交谈。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! "Een rare man" is a weird man, not a rare one. Rare (scarce) is "zeldzaam".
notes.zh: 假朋友！"Raar" 是奇怪，不是稀有。稀有是 "zeldzaam"。

notes.en: Rain suit ("regenpak") is common for cyclists.
notes.zh: 骑行者常穿雨衣套装("regenpak")。

notes.en: "In de richting van..." (In the direction of...).
notes.zh: "In de richting van..." (朝...方向)。

notes.en: Not to be confused with "jurk".
notes.zh: 不要和"jurk"(连衣裙)混淆。

notes.en: Colour of danger or stop.
notes.zh: 危险或停止的颜色。

notes.en: Singular: "schoen".
notes.zh: 单数："schoen"。

notes.en: Resting at night.
notes.zh: 晚上休息。

notes.en: Don't lose your house keys ("huissleutels")!
notes.zh: 别把家里的钥匙("huissleutels")弄丢了！

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! Not "slim" (thin). Thin is "dun" or "slank".
notes.zh: 假朋友！不是 "slim"(苗条)。苗条是 "dun" 或 "slank"。它是"聪明"的意思。

notes.en: False friend. Looks like "small", but means "narrow". Small is "klein".
notes.zh: 假朋友。看起来像 "small"，但意思是"窄"。小是 "klein"。

notes.en: Watch your speed ("maximumsnelheid").
notes.zh: 注意限速("maximumsnelheid")。

notes.en: Singular: "sok".
notes.zh: 单数："sok"。

notes.en: Busy traffic time. "Ochtendspits" (morning rush) and "avondspits" (evening rush).
notes.zh: 交通繁忙时段。分为早高峰("Ochtendspits")和晚高峰("avondspits")。

notes.en: "De trein vertrekt van spoor 5". Pay attention to changes.
notes.zh: "火车从5号站台出发"。注意站台变更。

notes.en: Traditional winter dish. Mashed potatoes mixed with vegetables (kale, carrots) and sausage ("rookworst").
notes.zh: 传统冬日菜。土豆泥混合蔬菜(羽衣甘蓝、胡萝卜)配熏香肠。

notes.en: Deposit on plastic bottles and cans. Return them to the supermarket machine ("flessenautomaat").
notes.zh: 塑料瓶和罐头的押金。去超市机器("flessenautomaat")退回可拿钱。

notes.en: "Centraal Station" (CS) is the main station.
notes.zh: "Centraal Station" (CS) 是中央火车站。

notes.en: "Tot straks!" means "See you in a bit!". "Later" usually means much further in the future.
notes.zh: 指"今天稍晚"或"不久后"。"Tot straks!" 是"一会儿见"。

notes.en: Sweetener.
notes.zh: 甜味剂。

notes.en: AH (Albert Heijn) and Jumbo are common.
notes.zh: AH (Albert Heijn) 和 Jumbo 很常见。

notes.en: "Kopje thee?" (Cup of tea?).
notes.zh: "Kopje thee?" (来杯茶吗？)。

notes.en: "Heb je tijd?" (Do you have time?).
notes.zh: "Heb je tijd?" (你有空吗？)。

notes.en: On your birthday, you buy cake/treats for your colleagues/classmates (you treat them).
notes.zh: 过生日时，通常是你自己买蛋糕或糖果请同事或同学吃。

notes.en: Often digital now (OV-chipkaart or app), but the word is still used.
notes.zh: 虽然现在多用OV卡或App，但这个词还在用。

notes.en: Warm clothes for winter.
notes.zh: 冬天的保暖衣物。

notes.en: Crucial! If you forget, you lose ~20 euros deposit.
notes.zh: 非常重要！忘记刷下车会扣除约20欧押金。

notes.en: This day.
notes.zh: 今天。

notes.en: Important! Congratulate the person AND their family/friends. "Circle parties" are common.
notes.zh: 很重要！不仅祝贺寿星，还要祝贺ta的家人朋友。

notes.en: Cars, bikes, trams together.
notes.zh: 车流、人流的总称。

notes.en: "Vers brood" (fresh bread) or "verse groenten" (fresh vegetables).
notes.zh: "Vers brood"(新鲜面包) 或 "verse groenten"(新鲜蔬菜)。

notes.en: Common word for train travelers. "De trein heeft 5 minuten vertraging".
notes.zh: 坐火车常听到的词。"火车晚点5分钟"。

notes.en: "Ik vind het leuk" (I think it's nice) OR finding an object.
notes.zh: "Ik vind het leuk" (我觉得它不错) 或者找到东西。

notes.en: "Haring" (herring) is a Dutch snack.
notes.zh: "Haring"(鲱鱼)是荷兰特色小吃。

notes.en: "Rundvlees" (beef), "varkensvlees" (pork), "kip" (chicken).
notes.zh: "Rundvlees"(牛肉)，"varkensvlees"(猪肉)，"kip"(鸡肉)。

notes.en: "Mag ik iets vragen?" (Can I ask something?).
notes.zh: "Mag ik iets vragen?" (我能问个问题吗？)。

notes.en: "Ben je vrij?" (Are you off work? / Are you free?).
notes.zh: "Ben je vrij?" (你休息吗？/你有空吗？)。

notes.en: Tap water ("kraanwater") is drinkable in NL.
notes.zh: 荷兰的自来水("kraanwater")可以直接喝。

notes.en: 7 days.
Red ("rode") or white ("witte").
notes.zh: 红酒("rode")或白酒("witte")。

notes.en: "Ik wil graag..." (I would like...).
notes.zh: "Ik wil graag..." (我想要...)。

notes.en: "Tegenwind" (headwind) is the cyclist's enemy. "Meewind" is rare luck.
notes.zh: "Tegenwind"(逆风)是骑车人的噩梦。

notes.en: "Winkelcentrum" (shopping center).
notes.zh: "Winkelcentrum" (购物中心)。

notes.en: Opposite of black.
notes.zh: 黑色的反义词。

notes.en: Crucial verb. "Ik word oud" (I am getting old). Also used for passive voice.
notes.zh: 核心动词。"Ik word..." (我变得...)。也用于被动语态。

notes.en: "Wat zeg je?" (What do you say?).
notes.zh: "Wat zeg je?" (你说什么？)。

notes.en: Looking for something lost.
notes.zh: 找东西。

notes.en: Seasoning.
notes.zh: 调味料。

notes.en: "Zwartrijden" (traveling without a ticket).
notes.zh: "Zwartrijden" (逃票)。

notes.en: Opposite of "afwezig".
notes.zh: "Afwezig"(缺席)的反义词。

notes.en: Not being at work or school.
notes.zh: 没来上班或上学。

notes.en: Requires employers to ensure a healthy and safe workplace.
notes.zh: 要求雇主确保员工拥有健康安全的工作场所的法律。

notes.en: Salary before taxes (loonheffing) and premiums (like pension and unemployment insurance) are deducted.
notes.zh: 尚未扣除税金和保险的工资总额。

notes.en: Agreements about working conditions, salary, etc., made between employers and unions (vakbonden) for an entire sector.
notes.zh: 行业内雇主和工会达成的关于工作条件和工资的协议。

notes.en: People you work with.
notes.zh: 一起工作的人。

notes.en: "Vast contract" (permanent) is gold for mortgages. "Tijdelijk" is temporary.
notes.zh: "Vast contract"(永久合同)对贷款买房很重要。

notes.en: "Werkervaring" (work experience).
notes.zh: "Werkervaring" (工作经验)。

notes.en: Mandatory place to register a new business.
notes.zh: 在荷兰注册公司的强制性机构。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! Not a "map" (geographic). A map is "kaart" or "plattegrond". "Map" is a file folder.
notes.zh: 假朋友！不是地图 (kaart)。"Map" 是文件夹。

notes.en: The actual amount of money received in your bank account after all deductions.
notes.zh: 扣除所有税费和保险后实际到账的金额。

notes.en: Required when starting your own business (eigen zaak) and seeking funding from a bank or municipality.
notes.zh: 创建自己的公司时必需的文件，用于从银行或市政厅获得贷款。

notes.en: "Ontslag nemen" (quit) or "ontslag krijgen" (get fired).
notes.zh: "Ontslag nemen" 是辞职，"ontslag krijgen" 是被解雇。

notes.en: Task you have to do.
notes.zh: 必须完成的任务。

notes.en: Your study or professional training.
notes.zh: 你的学历或职业培训。

notes.en: Formal clothing for men.
notes.zh: 男士正装。

notes.en: Extra hours worked. Sometimes paid, sometimes "tijd voor tijd" (time back).
notes.zh: 额外工作时间。有时给钱，有时调休("tijd voor tijd")。

notes.en: Usually 1 or 2 months. Both sides can quit immediately.
notes.zh: 通常1-2个月。双方都可以随时解除合同。

notes.en: Work schedule or school timetable.
notes.zh: 工作排班或学校课表。

notes.en: Often paid monthly around the 24th. Don't forget "vakantiegeld" (holiday money) in May!
notes.zh: 通常每月发。别忘了5月份发的 "vakantiegeld" (度假金，通常是年薪的8%)！

notes.en: Applying for a job. Interview is "sollicitatiegesprek".
notes.zh: 指应聘工作。面试是 "sollicitatiegesprek"。

notes.en: Money from gov if unemployed ("WW") or disabled ("WIA").
notes.zh: 失业("WW")或丧失劳动能力时政府发的钱。

notes.en: Making something clear.
notes.zh: 说明或解释。

notes.en: Agency that mediates temporary work (tijdelijk werk). They pay salaries and deduct taxes/premiums.
notes.zh: 提供临时工作的中介机构。他们负责支付工资和扣除税款/保险。

notes.en: Things you can do well.
notes.zh: 你会的技能。

notes.en: An open job position.
notes.zh: 招聘广告/职位空缺。

notes.en: Dutch meetings can be long and involve lots of discussion ("polderen").
notes.zh: 荷兰会议可能很长，讨论很多("polderen"模式)。

notes.en: The company or person who hires you.
notes.zh: 雇佣你的公司或人。

notes.en: Person who works for the company.
notes.zh: 为公司工作的人。

notes.en: Calling your employer to say you are sick.
notes.zh: 打电话给雇主说生病了。

notes.en: Working without paying taxes and premiums. This is forbidden (verboden) and results in no benefits (ziektegeld, uitkering).
notes.zh: 不缴税和保险金工作。这是非法的，且生病或失业时无法获得任何津贴。

notes.en: Separating waste ("afval scheiden") is important (paper, glass, plastic, rest).
notes.zh: 垃圾分类("afval scheiden")很重要（纸、玻璃、塑料、其余）。

notes.en: Mandatory in the Netherlands (e.g., GFT, paper, glass).
notes.zh: 强制性垃圾分类（如 GFT 是果蔬园艺垃圾）。

notes.en: The person living in a house.
notes.zh: 住在房子里的人。

notes.en: Security deposit when renting a house.
notes.zh: 租房时的押金。

notes.en: GWL. Usually paid separately from rent ("exclusief").
notes.zh: 简称GWL。通常房租不包("exclusief")，需另付。

notes.en: False friend: looks like "hire". Use for houses/objects. Hiring a person is "aannemen".
notes.zh: 虽像 "hire" 但指租房/物。雇人是 "aannemen"。

notes.en: Owner of the rental property.
notes.zh: 房子的主人。

notes.en: Read carefully before signing!
notes.zh: 签字前仔细阅读！

notes.en: Loan for a house. Interest ("rente") is tax deductible ("hypotheekrenteaftrek").
notes.zh: 买房贷款。利息("rente")可以退税("hypotheekrenteaftrek")。

notes.en: Person who helps you buy or sell a house. "Aankoopmakelaar" helps you buy.
notes.zh: 帮你买卖房子的人。"Aankoopmakelaar" 是买方中介。

notes.en: Required when signing the deed of sale (verkoopakte) for a house.
notes.zh: 买房时必须去公证处签署买卖契约。

notes.en: Repairs and upkeep of the house.
notes.zh: 房子的修理和保养。

notes.en: Covers damage to the structure of the house (roof, walls). Mandatory if you have a mortgage.
notes.zh: 涵盖房屋结构本身的损失。如果你有房屋贷款，这是必须购买的。

notes.en: The interest (rente) paid on a mortgage can be claimed back from the Belastingdienst.
notes.zh: 房贷的利息部分可以从税务局获得退税。

notes.en: If you break something in a rented house.
notes.zh: 如果弄坏了租来的房子里的东西。

notes.en: Extra costs on top of rent for cleaning common areas, sometimes heating.
notes.zh: 房租之外的费用，用于清洁公共区域，有时包含暖气费。

notes.en: "Ik ga verhuizen". Don't forget to inform the municipality.
notes.zh: "我要搬家了"。别忘了通知市政厅。

notes.en: Provides social rental housing (sociale huurwoning). Often requires registration and results in a long waiting list (wachtlijst).
notes.zh: 提供社会租房的机构。通常需要登记并进入等待名单 (wachtlijst)。

notes.en: Where you pick up prescription medicine from your huisarts. Drugstore ("Drogist" like Kruidvat) is for shampoo/aspirin.
notes.zh: 拿处方药的地方。买洗发水或普通阿司匹林去 "Drogist" (如 Kruidvat)。

notes.en: "Arm gebroken" (broken arm).
notes.zh: "Arm gebroken" (断臂)。

notes.en: Plural: "benen". "Op de been zijn" (to be up and about).
notes.zh: 复数："benen"。"Op de been zijn" (恢复活动)。

notes.en: Medical care provided by a doctor.
notes.zh: 医生提供的治疗方案。

notes.en: What you say to someone who is sick.
notes.zh: 对生病的人说的祝福语。

notes.en: Unwanted effect of a medicine.
notes.zh: 药物的不良反应。

notes.en: "Buikpijn" (stomach ache).
notes.zh: "Buikpijn" (肚子痛)。

notes.en: Feeling lightheaded.
notes.zh: 头昏眼花。

notes.en: Mandatory amount you pay before insurance kicks in (usually ~€385/year).
notes.zh: 医保理赔前需自付的金额，通常每年约 385 欧。

notes.en: "Hand geven" (shake hands).
notes.zh: "Hand geven" (握手)。

notes.en: "Hoofdpijn" (headache).
notes.zh: "Hoofdpijn" (头痛)。

notes.en: First contact for ANY medical issue. Need referral ("verwijsbrief") for specialists.
notes.zh: 医疗首要联系人。看专科必须有家庭医生的转诊信("verwijsbrief")。

notes.en: "Keelpijn" (sore throat).
notes.zh: "Keelpijn" (喉咙痛)。

notes.en: In medical context: what is bothering you.
notes.zh: 在医疗语境下指身体不适的症状。

notes.en: High body temperature.
notes.zh: 体温过高。

notes.en: In-home help from a kraamverzorgende for about a week after birth. Must be applied for early (5 months prior).
notes.zh: 分娩后一周内，护工（kraamverzorgende）会上门帮忙。需要提前申请。

notes.en: Prescription drugs from apotheek.
notes.zh: 从药房拿的处方药。

notes.en: Feeling like you need to vomit.
notes.zh: 想吐的感觉。

notes.en: "Mond houden" (shut up - rude).
notes.zh: "Mond houden" (闭嘴 - 不礼貌)。

notes.en: "Verstopte neus" (blocked nose).
notes.zh: "Verstopte neus" (鼻塞)。

notes.en: Plural: "ogen". "Oogarts" (eye doctor).
notes.zh: 复数："ogen"。"Oogarts" (眼科医生)。

notes.en: Plural: "oren". "Oorpijn" (earache).
notes.zh: 复数："oren"。"Oorpijn" (耳痛)。

notes.en: The Dutch doctor's solution to everything. "Take a paracetamol and come back in 2 weeks."
notes.zh: 荷兰神药。医生常说："吃点扑热息痛，两周后不好再来。"

notes.en: "Rugpijn" (back pain). Very common.
notes.zh: "Rugpijn" (背痛)。很常见。

notes.en: Doctor's consultation time. Usually by appointment only.
notes.zh: 医生看诊时间，通常需预约。

notes.en: Not covered by basic insurance usually! Need extra insurance ("aanvullend").
notes.zh: 基本医保通常不报销！需要买附加险("aanvullend")。

notes.en: "Ik ben verkouden" (I have a cold).
notes.zh: "Ik ben verkouden" (我感冒了)。

notes.en: Primary caregiver for low-risk pregnant women, providing controls and assistance during delivery (bevalling).
notes.zh: 正常怀孕期间的主要护理人员，负责产检和分娩协助。

notes.en: The magic paper from your GP you need to see a specialist or go to hospital.
notes.zh: 家庭医生给的"通行证"，没有它看不了专科医生。

notes.en: You have 10 fingers.
notes.zh: 你有10根手指。

notes.en: Plural: "voeten". "Te voet" (on foot).
notes.zh: 复数："voeten"。"Te voet" (步行)。

notes.en: "Ik ben ziek". When calling in sick for work: "Zich ziek melden".
notes.zh: "我病了"。向公司请病假叫 "Zich ziek melden"。

notes.en: For emergencies or specialists.
notes.zh: 处理急诊或专科问题。

notes.en: Mandatory for everyone living in NL.
notes.zh: 所有荷兰居住者强制购买。

notes.en: "Belastingaangifte" (tax return) or "aangifte doen bij politie" (report a crime).
notes.zh: 通常指 "Belastingaangifte"(报税) 或去警察局 "aangifte doen"(报案)。

notes.en: You apply for a subsidy or permit ("toeslag/vergunning aanvragen").
notes.zh: 申请津贴或许可证("toeslag/vergunning aanvragen")。

notes.en: Crucial. You need an "afspraak" for everything (doctor, city hall). "Afspraak is afspraak" (deal is a deal).
notes.zh: 很重要。看医生、去市政厅都要预约。"Afspraak is afspraak" 意为"说话算话"。

notes.en: Unable to work due to illness or injury. May qualify for a WIA benefit.
notes.zh: 因疾病或受伤而无法工作。可申请 WIA 津贴。

notes.en: Taxes. The "Belastingdienst" sends the dreaded blue envelopes ("blauwe brief").
notes.zh: 税。"Belastingdienst"(税务局)寄来的蓝色信封让人瑟瑟发抖。

notes.en: "Bewijs van inschrijving" (proof of registration).
notes.zh: "Bewijs van inschrijving" (注册证明)。

notes.en: For parking, speeding, or no light on bike.
notes.zh: 停车、超速或自行车没灯都会被罚。

notes.en: The unique number for tax, work, and healthcare. Everyone calls it "BSN".
notes.zh: 税务、工作和医疗必备的唯一号码。大家都叫它 "BSN"。

notes.en: Your online ID for government services. Everyone calls it "DigiD".
notes.zh: 用于登录政府服务的在线ID。大家都叫它 "DigiD"。

notes.en: Forbidden by the constitution (grondwet). Complaints can be filed at the Anti Discriminatie Bureau (ADB).
notes.zh: 在荷兰是禁止的。投诉可以提交给反歧视局（ADB）。

notes.en: Local government. Go here for registration ("inschrijven"), ID, driving license.
notes.zh: 地方政府。去那里注册地址("inschrijven")、办身份证、驾照。

notes.en: You need to put this at the bottom of contracts.
notes.zh: 合同底部必须签这个。

notes.en: Money received from the Belastingdienst for rent, depending on income and rent price.
notes.zh: 税务局根据收入和房租价格发放的住房补贴。

notes.en: The process/exam to become integrated. Needed for PR or citizenship.
notes.zh: 融入考试。申请永居或入籍必须通过。

notes.en: Government agency handling visas and residence permits.
notes.zh: 处理签证和居留许可的政府机构。

notes.en: Mandatory registering your address at the municipality. Illegal to live somewhere without it.
notes.zh: 在市政厅注册地址。必须做，否则违法 ("illegal onderhuur")。

notes.en: Quarterly allowance paid to parents for each child up to 18 years old, managed by the SVB (Sociale Verzekeringsbank).
notes.zh: 每季度发放的津贴，支付给有 18 岁以下子女的父母，由 SVB 管理。

notes.en: ID card/passport. Mandatory to carry from age 14 ("toonplicht").
notes.zh: 身份证/护照。14岁以上必须随身携带("toonplicht")。

notes.en: The desk at the municipality where you ask questions.
notes.zh: 市政厅的办事柜台。

notes.en: "Melding maken" (to report an issue).
notes.zh: "Melding maken" (报告问题)。

notes.en: Place to report discrimination complaints.
notes.zh: 举报歧视的地方，如 Anti Discriminatie Bureau (ADB)。

notes.en: Applying for Dutch citizenship. Requires passing the inburgeringsexamen.
notes.zh: 申请荷兰国籍。需要通过融入考试 (inburgeringsexamen)。

notes.en: Travel document. Keep it safe.
notes.zh: 旅行证件。妥善保管。

notes.en: Third Tuesday of September. The King travels to the Binnenhof in the Gouden Koets to read the Troonrede.
notes.zh: 每年 9 月的第三个星期二，国王乘坐金色马车（gouden koets）前往议会宣读政府计划。

notes.en: "Bankrekening" (bank account). In a restaurant: "Mag ik de rekening?" (Can I have the bill?).
notes.zh: "Bankrekening"(银行账户)。餐厅里说 "Mag ik de rekening?" (买单)。

notes.en: Valid for 10 years usually. Can also be used as ID in some cases.
notes.zh: 通常有效期10年。某些情况下可作身份证使用。

notes.en: Dutch nationals aged 18+ have the right to vote (actief kiesrecht). Non-nationals living legally for 5 years can vote for the Gemeenteraad.
notes.zh: 投票。18岁以上荷兰人有选举权。合法居住满 5 年的外国人可投票选举市议会。

notes.en: Government financial help: "zorgtoeslag" (health), "huurtoeslag" (rent).
notes.zh: 政府补助：如 "zorgtoeslag"(医保津贴)、"huurtoeslag"(房租津贴)。

notes.en: The King reads the government's plans for the next year on Prinsjesdag (third Tuesday of September).
notes.zh: 在王子日（9 月第三个星期二），国王宣读政府下一年的计划。

notes.en: The ID card that proves you are allowed to live in NL.
notes.zh: 证明你可以在荷兰居住的证件（ID卡）。

notes.en: For building, parking, or staying ("parkeervergunning").
notes.zh: 如建筑许可、停车许可("parkeervergunning")。

notes.en: Voting event. Elections are held every 4 years for the Tweede Kamer and Gemeenteraad.
notes.zh: 投票活动。例如每 4 年举行一次的国会二院和市议会选举。

notes.en: Literally "wait word". Essential for logging into websites.
notes.zh: 字面意是"等待词"。登录网站必备。

notes.en: Changing your data or address.
notes.zh: 修改数据或地址。

translations.zh: 医疗津贴 / 医保补贴

notes.en: Money received from the Belastingdienst to help pay health insurance premiums, depending on income.
notes.zh: 税务局根据收入发放的补贴，用于支付医疗保险费。
